entry.title: Psevdon1m/custom-framework: This project is an implementation of a lightweight web framework created as part of Stephen Grider's Udemy TypeScript course. It demonstrates core concepts of popular frameworks like Backbone.js and Marionette.js by building a simplified version with TypeScript.
entry.content: This project is an implementation of a lightweight web framework created as part of Stephen Grider's Udemy TypeScript course. It demonstrates core concepts of popular frameworks like Backbone.js and Marionette.js by building a simplified version with TypeScript.
